des:
Experience even more convenience with the Liebherr SmartDevice Skill and Alexa. Control your connected appliance with your voice. 

Activate the Skill in the Alexa app and link your SmartDevice app account. Your connected appliances in the SmartDevice app will then be synchronised in the Alexa app. 

Note: The appliances must first be connected to the internet via the SmartDevice app to be able to control them with Alexa. 

Here is a selection of voice commands: 
"Alexa, turn on BottleTimer in Fridge*."
"Alexa, set IceMaker to Max Ice in Fridge*."
"Alexa, is IceMaker on in Fridge*?"
"Alexa, turn on SuperCool in Fridge*"
"Alexa, set the Cooler Temperature to five degrees in Fridge*." 
"Alexa, what is the Freezer Temperature in Fridge*?" 

AutoDoor x Alexa: 

With AutoDoor appliances from Liebherr and the Liebherr SmartDevice skill for Amazon Alexa, your everyday life becomes even easier. 
Imagine you are baking and the recipe calls for you to put the cake batter in the fridge before baking. Simply say:

"Alexa, open the Fridge*"

and the fridge door will open. No more need for an extra pair of hands!
 
*Fridge is a name example for appliances in the SmartDevice app. You can change it there at any time. 
 
Please also check our FAQ (https://go.liebherr.com/tw78f4).
